primevc.types.Asset

type
class
implements
primevc.core.traits.IValueObject
primevc.core.traits.IDisposable
subclasses
primevc.types.BitmapAsset, primevc.types.BytesAssetBase, primevc.types.DisplayAsset
This class makes it easy to load images from several sources, e.g. load from an URL, instantiate from an embedded asset, set the BitmapData directly, give it an Bitmap instance or copy the pixels of a given DisplayObject.

Static Methods

inline createEmptyBitmap(w : Int, h : Int) : Asset

fromUnkown(v : Dynamic, ?factory : primevc.types._Asset.Factory) : Asset
